about_the_game:
Samira´s House is an exciting adventure and mystery game that puts the player in the shoes of a skilled real estate agent facing a unique challenge. His mission is to urgently sell a house, but upon arrival, he discovers that the property has been abandoned for years and is infested with ghosts and mysterious supernatural entities.

Trapped inside the house, the protagonist must uncover the dark events of the past that have left these troubled souls trapped in this place. As he explores every corner of the haunted house, he will find clues and solve puzzles to unravel the truth and break free from this terrifying nightmare.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3570K or AMD FX-8310
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon RX 470
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Versión 12
  • Additional Notes: SSD recommended

Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790 or AMD Ryzen 3 3200G
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 6GB / GTX 1660 Super or Radeon RX 590
  • DirectX: Version 12
